ygData.subject: Re: Anti-Camping ?
ygData.msgSnippet: There is no anti camp code, and if you get a pair of boots every 5 hours you are very lucky... I have camped there for a total of 49 hours... Still no boots
ygData.messageBody:
There is no anti camp code, and if you get a pair of boots every 5 hours you
are very lucky... I have camped there for a total of 49 hours... Still no
boots although I have gotten 13 other people boots...


>From: "Reuben Aguilar" <reuben@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_rainbow@onelist.com
>To: <EQ_rainbow@onelist.com>
>Subject: [EQ_rainbow] Anti-Camping ?
>Date: Tue, 10 Aug 1999 08:52:28 -0700
>
>From: "Reuben Aguilar" <reuben@...>
>
>Hey there.. Now I read that they put in Anti-Camping code ingame. I heard
>people say it wasnt true.. but we decided to go to Najena for the J Boots.
>I
>being 17 and my party being on 22-25 I was the outcast, but they are my
>regular companions, so I knew Id be ok. _I am not one to level efficently
>so
>thats why im such a weenie compared to them.. Anyhow.. we get to the place
>where the J boots spawn and there is a group there.. Said they've been
>there
>for 6 hours. So We wait, and 2 spawns no boots, next 2 spawns were not even
>the named NPC for them, A necro spawned instead. So After like a hour, I
>got bored and we left..Decided to get tantacle whip. I have the key so we
>are going back early today.. but I am thinking for what if its going to
>take
>us 3 hours just to get one Journeyman boots ? uugh.. have any of you seen
>this in specific areas besides here ? Cause I want to Kill Najena to get
>the
>FBR, but don't want (nor have the time) to wait for 6 hours before I get
>mine.
>
>Anyone else have this issue ?
>
>Reuben
>
